org.drip.service.env

Class BondManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.env.BondManager

  • public class BondManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a container that holds the EOD and bond static information on a per issuer basis.

    • Constructor Summary

      BondManager()

      • SetEOS

        public static final boolean SetEOS(java.sql.Statement stmt)
        Sets the option schedule for all the bonds by extracting them from the database
        Parameters:
        stmt - SQL Statement object representing the query to be executed
        Returns:
        False indicates that the operation could not complete fully - true indicates that it was successful

      • CalcBondMeasures

        public static BondOutput CalcBondMeasures(java.lang.String strBondDescription,
                          Bond bond,
                          ValuationParams valParams,
                          MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                          double dblBidPrice,
                          double dblAskPrice)
        Calculates the full set of calculable bond measures given the bond, the valuation parameters, and the prices. Optionally, depending on the setting, it also displays formatted runs.
        Parameters:
        strBondDescription - String describing the bond
        bond - Bond object
        valParams - ValuationParams
        mpc - MarkerParamsContainer containing all the curves
        dblBidPrice - Double representing the bid price
        dblAskPrice - Double representing the ask price
        Returns:
        The BondOutput object

      • CalcBondAnalyticsFromPrice

        public static BondOutput CalcBondAnalyticsFromPrice(java.lang.String strCUSIPIn,
                                    MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                                    JulianDate dt,
                                    double dblBidPrice,
                                    double dblAskPrice)
        Calculates the full set of calculable bond measures given the CUSIP, the valuation parameters, and the prices. Optionally, depending on the setting, it also displays formatted runs.
        Parameters:
        strCUSIPIn - Bond CUSIP/ISIN
        mpc - MarkerParamsContainer containing all the curves
        dt - Valuation Date
        dblBidPrice - Bid Price
        dblAskPrice - Ask Price
        Returns:
        The BondOutput

      • CalcFullBondAnalytics

        public static int CalcFullBondAnalytics(MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                        JulianDate dt,
                        double dblBidPrice,
                        double dblAskPrice)
        Calculates the full set of bond measures for all available bonds given the same bid and ask prices. Depending upon the setting, may also generate the runs.
        Parameters:
        mpc - MarketParamsContainer containing the curves
        dt - Valuation date
        dblBidPrice - Bid Price
        dblAskPrice - Ask Price
        Returns:
        Number of bonds successfully processed (excludes matured bonds)

      • FullBondMarketAnalytics

        public static int FullBondMarketAnalytics(MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                          JulianDate dt)
        Calculates the complete set of bond measures for all the bonds from their closing bid/ask prices.
        Parameters:
        mpc - MarketParamsContainer containing the curves
        dt - Valuation Date
        Returns:
        Number of bonds successfully processed (excludes matured bonds and bonds for which closing prices are not available).

      • GetMidMarksForCUSIP

        public static final double GetMidMarksForCUSIP(java.lang.String strCUSIP,
                         JulianDate dt,
                         java.sql.Statement stmt)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the mid marks (price/spreads) for the given ISIN/CUSIP and the valuation date
        Parameters:
        strCUSIP - ISIN/CUSIP string
        dt - Valuation Date
        stmt - SQL Statement object representing the connection
        Returns:
        Double representing the mid marks
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is an input error or a database failure

      • LoadFromBondId

        public static final Bond LoadFromBondId(MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                  java.sql.Statement stmt,
                  java.lang.String strBondId,
                  double dblScheduleStart)
        Loads the bond object using its ID
        Parameters:
        mpc - MarketParamsContainer containing the closing curves
        stmt - SQL Statement object representing the query
        strBondId - ISIN/CUSIP/other identifiable bond IDs
        dblScheduleStart - Schedule start date - needed for bonds with embedded American options, so that the discretized schedules can start from this date (usually the Valuation date)
        Returns:
        Bond object

        dblAskPrice - Ask Price

      • CalcAndLoadBondMeasuresFromPrice

        public static final boolean CalcAndLoadBondMeasuresFromPrice(java.sql.Statement stmt,
                                       Bond bond,
                                       ValuationParams valParams,
                                       MarketParamsContainer mpc,
                                       double dblPrice)
        Calculates the bond measures for the given bond and price, and loads them onto the DB
        Parameters:
        stmt - SQL Statement object representing the executable query
        bond - Input bond
        valParams - ValuationParams containing the EOD
        mpc - MarketParamsContainer containing the EOD curves
        dblPrice - Double price
        Returns:
        Success (true), failure (false)

        Parameters:

        dtEOD - EOD Date
        Returns:
        Integer representing the number of bonds calculated and saved

        dtEODStart - EOD start
        dtEODFinish - EOD finish
        Returns:
